summary: This is an email correspondence regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein (prisoner #68127-054), forwarding an Institution Disciplinary Process Report. It involves a Unit Manager and Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as inmate #68127-054, the subject of the forwarded Institution Disciplinary Process Report.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: The Associate Warden at MCC New York, located at 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007.

connections.description: Both are staff members at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, with M being a Unit Manager and the other an Associate Warden.
Unit Manager M is responsible for managing Epstein as an inmate at MCC New York.
The Associate Warden oversees the facility where Epstein is incarcerated.

events.title: Disciplinary Process Report for Epstein

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York

locations.context: The federal detention facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held as inmate #68127-054.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated as inmate #68127-054 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York as of July 30, 2019.
An Institution Disciplinary Process Report regarding Epstein was generated and forwarded via email on July 30, 2019.
The correspondence involves prison staff including a Unit Manager (M) and an Associate Warden at MCC New York.
